fixerapi: an R client for the fixer.io currency api

The fixer.io API provides real-time exchange rates for 170 currencies, covering 1999 to the present. fixer.io requires an account and a private key, and most features require a paid account. See the full API documentation for more details.

Developed by Evan Odell.
